item.title: First Post: how do I create this site in 30 minutes
item.description:
Hi, this first post I show you how I created this website.

You do not need any knowledge in PHP or CSS. You do need to know a little of windows terminal, and git.

First, download Hugo.

The second and last step is follow this article.

item.title: Top Youtube Channels
item.description:
Those are my current favorite Youtube channels.

Munchies

Munchies is not your usual food channel show, they do it raw and do it better. The amount of series they have is also impressive. My favorites are Chef’s Night Out and Action Bronson’s fuck that’s delicious.

Every frame of painting

This channel explain the technicality of movies. His analysis are very convince and he puts a lot of effort to make his point in why and how great movies are made.

Kirsten Dirksen

This is a relatively small channel not well known. Kirsten Dirksen and her family travel the world visiting interesting homes along the way. She does a great job showing their house and the building process.

Gary Vaynerchuk

Gary Vaynerchuk is an entrepreneur in a social media business. His vlogs are a modern version of Mad Men era. He has a great team who produces daily content that gives life and business advices.

Vsauce2

This might be my favorite channel on YouTube channel. Vsauce2 highlights what is going on in the top-notch level of scientific research around the world.

item.title: Boundary Element
item.description:
This is computer program to solve heat conduction in 3D solids through Boundary Element method.

The main solver is done in c++ using the fast multipole method by Dr. Yijun Liu. Pre and pos processing are done in Python3/GMSH.

The program can be found here.
